descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][size=5][i]Guard's Clothes[/i][/size][/font]
All armors in this mod use the mesh of Miner's Clothes in the base game.
All color variations can be crafted at the tanning rack and upgraded at the workbench.

[color=#d0e0e3][size=4][u]Guard's Clothes(10 color variations)[/u][/size][/color]
Category: Clothes(Leather)
Craft: the tanning rack
Primary material: Linen wrap

[color=#d0e0e3][size=4][u]Guard's Cloth Armor(10 color variations)[/u][/size][/color]
Category: Light Armor(Leather)
Craft: the forge
Primary material: Guard's Clothes

[color=#d0e0e3][size=4][u]Leather Clothes[/u][/size][/color]
Category: Light Armor(Leather)
Craft: the forge
Primary material: Leather

[color=#d0e0e3][size=4][u]Chainmail[/u][/size][/color]
Category: Light Armor(Iron)
Craft: the forge
Primary material: Iron ingot
[line]
[u][size=3][b]The Shops[/b][/size][/u]
[list][*][size=2]Whitrun - Belethor's general goods: Guard's Clothes(white), Guard's Cloth Armor(white), Leather Clothes, Chainmail (at random)
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Solitude - Bits and Pieces: All Guard's Cloth Armor (at random)
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Solitude - Radiant Raiment: All Guard's Clothes(at random)
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Windhelm - Blacksmith: All Guard's Cloth Armor (at random)
[/size][/*]
[/list]
[u][size=3][b]The tanning rack[/b][/size][/u]
[size=2]Guard's Clothes (white) or Guard's Cloth Armor (white) is required for the recipes to appear in the crafting menu.[/size]
[size=2]The following ingredients are also needed.[/size]

[list][*][size=2]Eastmarch blue [Blue Mountain Flower: 4][/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Haafingar red [Red Mountain Flower: 4][/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Rift purple [Purple Mountain Flower: 4][/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Reach green [Elves Ear: 4][/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Whiterun yellow [Creep Cluster: 2][/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Winterhold blue [Jazbay Grapes: 4][/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Falkreath navy blue [Void salts: 2][/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Hjaalmarch green [Hanging moss: 4][/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Pale gray [Giant Litchen: 4][/size][/*]
[/list]
[size=4]Other fix[/size]
This mod fixes some issue of the brown Miner's Clothes in the base game.
These are compatible with mods for textures.
- Fixed the texture assignment of the male model.
- Fixed the texture assignment of the female model in First Person View.

[size=4]Known Issue[/size]
-The mesh glitch of the female wrists.

[size=4][u]My other works for Guard[/u][/size]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57113/]Amulets of Skyrim[/url]
author: uni_SL

files.name: Guards Clothes
files.changelogHtml:
- Renamed the light armor "Guard's Clothes" to "Guard's Cloth Armor".
- Added new clothes and armors, "Guard's Clothes", "Leather Clothes" and "Chainmail".
- Improved all textures in version 1.0 and uploaded it as the optional file.
